sources.name: sourceNames
sources.script:
source(output(
		acctnum as string,
		fullname as string,
		phone as string,
		zip as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceNames

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
Copy sink(input(
		AddressID as string,
		Address1 as string,
		Address2 as string,
		City as string,
		Prop_4 as string,
		Prop_5 as string,
		Prop_6 as string,
		Prop_7 as string,
		Prop_8 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	rowUrlColumn:'undefined') ~> sink1

transformations.name: Orig
transformations.script:
CreateRowHash select(mapColumn(
		acctnum,
		fullname,
		phone,
		zip,
		SoundexValue,
		hashvalue
	))~> Orig

transformations.name: Copy
transformations.script:
CreateRowHash select(mapColumn(
		acctnum,
		fullname,
		phone,
		zip,
		SoundexValue,
		hashvalue
	))~> Copy

transformations.name: JoinCopyToOrig
transformations.script:
Grouping, Copy join(PossibleDupe == acctnum,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinCopyToOrig

transformations.name: FinalResults
transformations.script:
JoinCopyToOrig select(mapColumn(
		acctnum,
		fullname,
		phone,
		zip
	))~> FinalResults
